item.title: Thai and Cambodian troops clash at disputed border
item.description: At least two Thai soldiers are hurt as both sides accuse each other of firing the first shot.

item.title: Can you un-bleach coral? BBC visits remote reef to find out
item.description: The BBC's Katy Watson went to Australia's Ningaloo reef, the site of a mass bleaching event, to find out if the damage can be undone.

item.title: White House hits back at reports Trump named in Epstein files
item.description: It came as a US judge denied a justice department's bid to unseal Florida court files on Epstein.

item.title: A mother's heartbreak: The unresolved mystery of missing Indian student
item.description: A student of India's JNU university, Najeeb Ahmed went missing in 2016. A court now has closed the case.

item.title: In a Haitian city ruled by gangs, young rape survivor raises baby she was told to abort
item.description: Helene, abducted aged 17, is among thousands of women attacked as gang violence spreads in Haiti.
